author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
I tried to create a release but ran into this error:
```
Creating release: POST https://api.github.com/repos/NTimmons/NormalMaps.jl/releases: 502 Server Error []
```
To retry, comment on this PR with the phrase `TagBot tag`.
cc: @christopher-dG
<!-- 1e5debb0-8171-11e9-9089-b90ca3f244cd -->

thank you github very cool
TagBot tag

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/NTimmons/NormalMaps.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- d9a46cf0-8171-11e9-8ec1-aee7c2047652 -->
